Sentencas: In a cold region during winter, energy demand for residential heating is high and energy saving, the discharge of greenhouse gases, and air pollution are all of significant concern.
Titulo: Operational analysis of a small-capacity cogeneration system with a gas hydrate battery

Sentencas: We investigated the fundamental characteristics of an energy storage system with a GHB (gas hydrate battery) in which heat cycle by a unique change in state of gas hydrate operates using the low-temperature ambient air of a cold region.
Titulo: Operational analysis of a small-capacity cogeneration system with a gas hydrate battery

Sentencas: The proposed system with the GHB can respond to a high heat to power ratio caused by a small-scale CGS (cogeneration system) that is powered by a gas engine, a polymer electrolyte fuel cell, or a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Operational analysis of a small-capacity cogeneration system with a gas hydrate battery

Sentencas: In this paper, we explain how the relation between fossil fuel consumption and heat to power ratio of the different types of systems differ.
Titulo: Operational analysis of a small-capacity cogeneration system with a gas hydrate battery

Sentencas: We investigated the proposed system by laboratory experiments and analysis of the characteristics of power load and heat load of such a system in operation in Kitami, a cold district in Japan.
Titulo: Operational analysis of a small-capacity cogeneration system with a gas hydrate battery

Sentencas: If a hydrate formation space of 2 m(3) is introduced into the proposed system, 48%-52% (namely, power rate by green energy) of total electric power consumption is supplied by the GHB.
Titulo: Operational analysis of a small-capacity cogeneration system with a gas hydrate battery
